# PaintingA2 - Ann Arbor's Premier Painting Directory

> PaintingA2.com connects homeowners and businesses in Ann Arbor, Michigan with verified, professional painting contractors. We are the trusted local resource for finding quality painters for residential and commercial projects.

## About PaintingA2

PaintingA2 is a local business directory focused exclusively on painting services in the Ann Arbor, Michigan area. We help customers find trusted painting professionals while providing painters with quality leads from local customers actively seeking their services.

**Location Focus:** Ann Arbor, Michigan and surrounding Washtenaw County areas including Ypsilanti, Saline, Dexter, and Chelsea.

**Services Covered:**
- Interior house painting
- Exterior house painting
- Commercial painting
- Cabinet painting and refinishing
- Deck and fence staining
- Color consultation
- Pressure washing
- Drywall repair

- [Browse All Painters](https://paintinga2.com/listings): Complete directory of verified painting contractors in Ann Arbor

- [Commercial Painters](https://paintinga2.com/category/commercial): Business and industrial painting services
- [Interior Painting](https://paintinga2.com/category/interior): Indoor painting specialists
- [Exterior Painting](https://paintinga2.com/category/exterior): Outdoor and facade painting experts

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: How much does house painting cost in Ann Arbor?**
A: Interior painting in Ann Arbor typically ranges from $2-$6 per square foot depending on the condition of walls, paint quality, and room complexity. Exterior painting ranges from $1.50-$4 per square foot. Get specific quotes from our directory listings.

**Q: What should I look for when hiring a painter in Ann Arbor?**
A: Look for proper licensing, insurance (general liability and workers' compensation), references from local projects, BBB ratings, and clear written estimates. Our verified contractors meet these standards.

**Q: How long does it take to paint a house interior?**
A: A typical 2,000 sq ft home interior takes 3-5 days for a professional crew. Larger homes or those needing extensive prep work may take 1-2 weeks.

**Q: Do Ann Arbor painters work in winter?**
A: Yes, interior painting can be done year-round in Ann Arbor. Exterior painting is seasonal, typically from April through October when temperatures are consistently above 50Â°F.
